title: Resolve Issue of Unforeseen Obstruction
description: During excavation, a large, undocumented utility line is discovered. The PM must manage this issue.

tasks.description: Immediately log the discovery in the project's issue tracker, classifying it as 'High Priority'.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new high-priority issue is logged.

tasks.description: Contact the local utility locating service ('Call Before You Dig') to identify the owner of the line.
Initiate an RFI to the structural engineer to request a foundation redesign to avoid the obstruction.
tasks.expected_outcome: An RFI is sent to the engineer to develop a solution.
